new_user.title: Welcome, newcomer, to the Nuke system!
new_user.description:
Nuke is a unique development on Discord. Nuke is not the future, it is the present. Has your conversation reached a dead end? Launch the Nuke! It wonâ€™t be able to do anything for 5 minutes! But be ready to get a counterattack in the very next second. 
LET THE NUCLEAR WAR BEGIN!

new_user.title: Welcome, newcomer, to the Nuke system!
new_user.description:
And now I will explain how to use it. 
You need to remember two phrases: ```Give me the nuke remote``` and ```Give me the Mivinka```
With these, I understand that you need an arsenal.
You can receive the arsenal once per day.
To request it, use the command ```/case```

Now youâ€™ve got a nuke or a Mivinka. At your disposal, you have a launch button and a medkit.
Pressing the **launch button** (command) ```/nuclear *user*``` sends a nuke to your target.
**Mivinka** is needed to heal yourself if you get hit by a nuke. To heal, ask me in DM: ```/mivinka```.
You cannot launch a nuke at Sweeties or other bots. 
Come on! Get your first nuke right now!

Training is over! Good luck, General!

arsenal.nuclear_off: Nuclear mode is off. Would you like to turn it on?

start_bomb.arsenal_empty: Your nuclear arsenal is empty, General!
start_bomb.target_nuclear_off: Your target's nuclear mode is off!
start_bomb.self_bomb: Are you sure you want to launch a nuke on yourself?
start_bomb.hirohito: Oh no! {author} {target}, the nuke did a Hirohito and blew you both up
start_bomb.failed: Oops. The nuke failed. It seems it is too old.
start_bomb.dm_alert:
GENERAL! NOW IS NOT THE TIME TO DOZE OFF!

{author} launched {bomb} at us with their weapon and weâ€™re suffering from it!
Grab your Mivinka and get into battle!
`/mivinka`
start_bomb.mivina_help:
Hello! A nuke was launched at you.
To heal, use the command `/mivinka` in a DM with me...

mivina.no_member: Mivinkas are finished, General! Unfortunately, I canâ€™t help you!
mivina.no_mivina: Mivinkas are finished, General! Unfortunately, I canâ€™t help you!
mivina.success_dm: Roger that, General! Hope this never happens again!
mivina.bad_mivina:
{user}
Botched the Mivinka and added Beanz from Vafelka that came as a set. {user} got sick. It seems the Beanz were expired. Why?

nuclear_case.new_user: Welcome, General, to the Nuclear system! Type `/arsenal` for details.

nuclear_ui.nuclear_mode_off:
You saw a case in front of you. It had written on it: 'Enter the code phrase and an arsenal will appear in the case'.

You entered the code word, but the case turned into the word 'Declined'. It seems you need to activate nuclear mode...
nuclear_ui.bomb_success:
You saw a case in front of you. It had written on it: 'Enter the code phrase and an arsenal will appear in the case'.

You entered the code word and the case opened. Inside, you found a nuke. You take it for yourself.

 `+1 nuke in your arsenal`
nuclear_ui.bomb_cooldown:
You saw a case in front of you. It had written on it: 'Enter the code phrase and an arsenal will appear in the case'.

You entered the code word and the case opened. It was empty inside. It seems you should come back tomorrow for new armaments...
nuclear_ui.mivina_success:
You saw a case in front of you. It had written on it: 'Enter the code phrase and an arsenal will appear in the case'.

You entered the code word and the case opened. Inside, you found a Mivinka. You take it for yourself.

 `+1 Mivinka in your arsenal`
nuclear_ui.mivina_cooldown:
You saw a case in front of you. It had written on it: 'Enter the code phrase and an arsenal will appear in the case'.

You entered the code word and the case opened. It was empty inside. It seems you should come back tomorrow for new armaments...
nuclear_ui.wrong_codeword:
You saw a case in front of you. It had written on it: 'Enter the code phrase and an arsenal will appear in the case'.

You entered the wrong word. The case closed and you were rejected.
nuclear_ui.nuclear_mode_disable_prompt: You have already disabled the nuke! Please wait {hours}h {minutes}m.
nuclear_ui.nuclear_mode_disable_desc: Are you sure you want to disable nuclear mode? In doing so, you declare disarmament and will no longer have access to the Nuke system! You are 'pharmacy!'
nuclear_ui.nuclear_mode_disabled: Thank you for using the Nuke system. We await your return, General!
nuclear_ui.self_bomb_failed: Oops. The nuke didnâ€™t work. It seems it is too old.

help_command.title: My commands:
help_command.first_description:
You are on a simple and cozy Zheleshka server! 

Unique (almost) bots and features.
 **Letâ€™s start the nuclear war!**
Server owner: {guild_owner.mention}
Server creation date: `{guild.created_at.strftime("%d-%m-%Y")}`
Total members: `{len(guild.get_members())}`
Current legend: {legends[0].mention}
help_command.second_description:
`/bio` - information about the sweets.
`/profile` - user profile.
`/top` - leaderboards in various categories.
`/cute` - cute pictures of animals.
`/emotion` - hugs, kisses, etc.
`/nuke`, `/arsenal` - control the Nuke system.
`/suicide` - Press F.
`/random-number` - random number.

edit_profile_callback.error: An error occurred while editing the profile!

embed.title: __Customization__
embed.description: This section is all about customization!

embed.title: __Marmeladka__
embed.description: The main fox on this server, executing all the key functionsâ€”even providing you with this information. Learn all about her commands with `/help`.

embed.title: __Zefirka__
embed.description: According to the lore, she is Marmeladkaâ€™s schizophrenia. The top DJ of the server. She will play any tune for you from popular streaming platforms: YouTube Music, SoundCloud, Spotify, Apple Music.

embed.title: __Shocomelka__
embed.description: A friend of Marmeladka and Zefirka (sheâ€™s a tanuki, i.e. a raccoon dog). She lounges on her throne playing Lo-Fi music. She wants to bring harmony to this world.

embed.title: __Milka__
embed.description: If you ask around, sheâ€™s the top Kitsune, though her role is a bit less critical. She teams up with the main DJ, Zefirka, to fire up the server!

embed.title: __Kriska__
embed.description: This is Kriska, sheâ€™s new here but has already won everyone over. She can do many things, but most importantly, she is always there for you. She plays absolutely any kind of music.
